description: Check for mentions of employee wellbeing initiatives.
prompt_instructions: Analyze the CSR report excerpt text provided below, focusing on the Social Responsibility section.
Identify specific initiatives or programs mentioned related to employee wellbeing, health, or support (e.g., 'mental health support', 'flexible working', 'Healthy Habitat initiative').
Respond with 'Wellbeing Initiatives Found: Yes (Initiatives: <List of initiatives found, separated by comma>)' if initiatives are mentioned.
Respond with 'Wellbeing Initiatives Found: No' if no specific initiatives are mentioned.
